QueryViewSpec.Name: Rate Increase Constituents Increased with Child Info Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: This includes one row per active sponsorship increased
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select c.ID, c.LOOKUPID, c.NAME, so.ID as CHILDID, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME as CHILDNAME
from dbo.USR_SPONSOR_RATECHANGE_SPONSORSHIPS ri join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.id = ri.SPONSORSHIPID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc ON sc.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s_current ON s_current.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = sc.ID and s_current.STATUSCODE = 1 join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = s_current.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = s_current.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on rs.id = s.REVENUESPLITID join dbo.REVENUE r on r.ID = rs.REVENUEID join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = r.CONSTITUENTID where ri.INCREASERATE = 1
